actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the use and distribution of the award granted by the Indian Claims Commission to the Seminole Nation as it existed in Florida on September 19, 1823.

summary.text: Provides for the distribution, investment, and use of funds appropriated in satisfaction of the judgment awarded to the Seminole Indians in dockets 73 and 151 before the Indian Claims Commission.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the use and distribution of the award granted by the Indian Claims Commission to the Seminole Nation as it existed in Florida on September 19, 1823.
